articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Russian Dance Company
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys Performance Given by Russian Dance Company
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il enjoyed a performance given by the Russian State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company on a local performance tour.
					 He was greeted at the theatre by Director Elena Scherbakova who is heading the dance company.
					
					 She presented him with a gift prepared by the dance company.
					
					 He expressed thanks for this and had a warm conversation with the guest. He highly praised the artistes of the dance company for having conducted enthusiastic performing activities in Pyongyang and local areas during their visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 When he appeared in the auditorium of the theatre, the whole audience enthusiastically welcomed him with loud applause. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kang Sok Ju, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Generals of the Korean People's Army Kim Won Hong and Hyon Chol Hae, officials in the fields of culture and arts and media, creators and artistes.
					
					 The artistes of the dance company who became familiar with the Korean people through a series of performance tours of the DPRK staged Russian dance "Summer," dances "Kalmyk Dance" and "Tatar Girl," "Yablochko" from the fleet dance suite, Korean folk dance "Trio Dance," dances "Bulgarian Dance" and " Dance of Mongolian Sculptures," Ukrainian dance "Snow Storm," "Argentinian Tango" from the one act ballet "Inn in the Evening" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Through the performance the artistes truthfully represented the optimistic life, national emotion and peculiar customs of the people of Russia and nationalities of different countries with high artistry, clearly showcasing the stature of the dance company with a long history and tradition.
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as it impressively depicted the sentiments of peoples of different countries with peculiar rhythms and perfect ensemble.
					
					 Kim Jong Il congratulated the artistes on their successful performance and extended his greetings to them.

articles.title: Workers and GFTUK Members Meet to Protest against U.S. Imperialists
articles.content:
Workers and GFTUK Members Meet to Protest against U.S. Imperialists
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea held a meeting on the bank of the River Taedong where the monument to the sinking of the U.S. ship of aggression "General Sherman" stands and the U.S. imperialist armed spy ship "Pueblo" is anchored on Tuesday on the occasion of the "June 25 the Day of the Struggle against U.S. Imperialism."
					 A reporter and speakers at the meeting recalled that the sworn enemy U.S. imperialists stretched the tentacles of aggression to Korea from more than a century ago and ignited a war of aggression to destroy the young DPRK in its cradle on June 25, 1950.
					
					 The Korean war was the most brazen-faced and brigandish war of aggression in the world history of wars and a savage war of genocide baffling the human imagination, they said.
					
					 Noting that the U.S. imperialists have imposed all sorts of misfortune and sufferings upon the Korean people during the history, they declared that should the U.S. imperialists ignite a war again, the army and people of the DPRK will fully mobilize the nation's capability for self-defence built in every way under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, and wipe out the aggressors in this land to the last one and achieve the historic cause of national reunification.
					
					 They stressed the need for the workers and the members of the GFTUK to protect Kim Jong Il, who represents the destiny of the country and the nation, politically and ideologically at the cost of their lives and glorify the ever-victorious history of Songun Korea with the might of single-minded unity more powerful than a nuclear weapon, united closer around the headquarters of the revolution. 
					
					 A letter of protest was read out at the meeting.

articles.title: Agricultural Workers Vow to Take Revenge upon Enemy
articles.content:
Agricultural Workers Vow to Take Revenge upon Enemy
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting of agricultural workers was held outside the Class Education Hall in Kaesong City on Tuesday to vow to take revenge upon the enemy on the occasion of "June 25, the day of the struggle against U.S. imperialism".
					 Kang Chang Uk, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Kang and the speakers said that the Korean war launched by the U.S. imperialists was the most brazen-faced and brigandish war of aggression to suffocate the DPRK and reduce the whole of Korea to their colony.
					
					 They condemned the thrice-cursed atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists, recalling that they hurled more than two million troops including their aggressor forces and a huge quantity of war hardware into the Korean war, indiscriminately killing innocent people and reducing the cities, farm villages, industrial establishments, schools and hospitals to ashes.
					
					 They declared that the army and people in the DPRK will get fully prepared to go into action and would turn out to defend the country to the last in a do-or-die spirit, should the U.S. imperialists intrude into their fertile land even an inch.
					
					 The servicepersons and people in the DPRK will remain unfazed in face of any sanctions and blockade of the U.S. imperialists and are sure to win as long as they are under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, and have invincible military power and their single-minded unity.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists, Provoker of Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists, Provoker of Korean War
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Korean people still bear a deep grudge against the crimes of the U.S. imperialists, the provoker and criminal of the Korean war (June 25, 1950-July 27, 1953) though more than 50 years have passed since the war.
					The U.S. imperialists who decided to take the DPRK as the first target of attack for realizing the wild dream of world domination after their illegal occupation of south Korea worked out a plan for the Korean war and made all preparations for it.
					
					They desperately armed the south Korean puppet army with modern war means and raised its war capabilities to use it as the shock force for the war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					According to an official document released by the U.S. Congress, they handed over more than 145,000 rifles, some 2,000 machine guns and submachine guns, over 2,000 pieces of various calibers, 4,900-odd vehicles, 79 warships and others to the south Korean puppet army in 1949 alone.
					
					The number of the south Korean puppet troops who were armed with such war equipment and means and trained in the American way reached more than 100,000 as of September 1949.
					
					The U.S. imperialists deployed most of the south Korean puppet army on the front along the 38th parallel and incessantly perpetrated armed provocations against the DPRK.
					
					They built or expanded airfields, harbors, roads and others in south Korea in an extensive way. At the same time, they worked out a prearranged plan to conceal the armed aggression after the outbreak of the Korean war in an attempt to shift the responsibility for the war provocation on the DPRK.
					
					As seen above, the Korean war was a war of aggression started by the U.S. imperialists with full preparation.
					
					The U.S. magazine Life disclosed the fact that it was the first since the beginning of history that the Korean war had been fully prepared before its start.
					
					The historical facts evidently show that the U.S. imperialists are the provoker of the Korean war and the heinous enemy who imposed dreadful holocaust upon the Korean people.
					
					Nevertheless, they, who resorted to every conceivable trick to shift the responsibility for the outbreak of the Korean war to the DPRK while distorting the history, are running amuck to provoke another Korean war today.
					
					The United Nations Security Council, at the instigation of the U.S., adopted a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK on June 12, taking issue with its second nuclear test.
					
					This is another foul product of the U.S.-led international oppression to disarm the DPRK and to suffocate it economically for forcing the Korean people to give up their idea and system.
					
					If the U.S. imperialists start another war, ignorant of the ignominious defeat they had sustained in the past Korean war, the army and people of Korea will determinedly answer "sanctions" with retaliation and "confrontation" with all-out confrontation, the counter-measure based on the Songun idea, wipe out the aggressors on the globe once and for all and achieve the cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Greetings to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mozambican President
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Armando Emilio Guebuza, President of Mozambique, Wednesday on the occasion of the 34th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message sincerely wished the president great success in his noble work for development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Croatian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Croatian President
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Croatian President Stipe Mesic on the national day of Croatia.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the long-standing relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Greetings to Croatian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Croatian PM
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ivo Sanader, Croatian Prime Minister, Wednesday on its national day.
					 Kim in the message wished the Croatian government great success in its work for the development of the country and welfare of the people, expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Iranian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Iranian Embassy Officials Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Morteza Moradian and staff members of the Iranian embassy here gave a helping hand to the DPRK-Iran Friendship Ripsok Co-op Farm in Mundok County, South Phyongan Province, on Wednesday.
					They went round the monument to the poem dedicated to President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the Ripsok Revolutionary History Education Room built on the farm before helping the farmers in weeding maize field.
					
					 Together with farmers, they enjoyed an art performance given by pupils and kindergarteners.
					
					 The Iranian ambassador said that they wish the officials and members of the co-op farm associated with the leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il greater success in the efforts to open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation in 2012.
					
					 He expressed belief that the bilateral relations would further develop in all fields in the future, too.
					
					 The guests presented a vehicle to the farm.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Closes
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do Championship for Jongilbong Cup Closes
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The 12th national Taekwon-Do championship for Jongilbong Cup which was opened in the DPRK on June 19 closed with due ceremony at the Taekwon-Do Hall on Wednesday.
					 The contesters were divided into the youth group and the juvenile group. Taekwon-Do team of Pyongyang came first in team standing. Taekwon-Do team of North Phyongan Province placed first in Korean wrestling while team of South Hamgyong Province came first in Paduk.
					
					 The closing ceremony was attended by Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, Taekwon-Do players and school youth and children.
					
					 Hwang Pong Yong, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made a closing speech.

articles.title: Youth and Children Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Youth and Children Tour Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Youth and children from across the country made a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu.
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues of President Kim Il Sung standing in the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, on the shore of Lake Samji, at the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area and in the Chongbong Bivouac and before the mosaic depicting the three generals of Mt. Paektu erected in the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them in humble reverence.
					
					 They visited the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site and the Samjiyon Revolutionary Battle Site.
					
					  When they arrived at the Monument to Victory in Battles in Musan Area, they looked round the large group of sculptures in relievo of subsidiary theme with the bronze sculpture in relievo of Kim Jong Suk, an anti-Japanese heroine, the tower of a rifle, etc.
					
					They visited the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu and went round historic relics, being briefed before the birthplace of General Secretary Kim Jong Il on the fact that he was born in a simple log cabin and grew to be a great revolutionary.
					
					 They also made a study tour of the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site, the Mupho, Chongbong, Konchang and Pegaebong bivouacs, etc.  
					
					 During the study tour, they had diverse political and cultural events including a meeting to hear impressions given after reading reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas.

articles.title: Book "Among the People" (Vol. 81) Off Press
articles.content:
Book "Among the People" (Vol. 81) Off Press
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 81 of "Among the People", a collection of reminiscences.
					 Contained in the book are 18 pieces of reminiscences telling about the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung for national prosperity and the people's happiness and his noble popular traits.
					
					 Among them are reminiscences "Without expecting any privilege and benefit" and "Paternal affection felt on medicine price", which deal with the fact that the President taught the officials to share the turns and twists with the people and place the interests of the people before anything else and led the work for invariably enforcing the universal free medical care system.
					
					 Reminiscences "It is only you that I can depend on" and "Leading the people to do everything by their own efforts" vividly tell about the wise leadership of the President who called on workers in the field of the munitions industry during the grim Fatherland Liberation War and aroused them to the production of shells and guided the Taegye Islet tideland reclamation project.
					
					 The book also deals with the facts that the President visited a steel works to teach the Juche-based steel production method, encouraged the young people to perform feats in subduing sea and led the scientists to conduct researches in keeping with the specific conditions of the country and the interests of the people from the Juche-based stand.
					
					 Carried in it are reminiscences introducing the great love and noble popular traits of the President who had taken warm care of bereaved families of the revolutionary soldiers who were carried away, always remembering them.

articles.title: New Scientific and Technological Books Released
articles.content:
New Scientific and Technological Books Released
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Publishing House of Science and Technology has recently brought out new books.
					"Computer Viruses and Security" gives a comprehensive description of the concept and kinds of viruses and the course of their evolution and development, the principle of their operation and basic knowledge of them. It also deals with the principle of manufacture of anti-virus products and global preventive measures and the establishment of legal and practical systems for their implementation in different countries.
					
					"Theory on Identification and Recognition of Objects" gives information on classifying, one of the essential IT processing techniques, and algorithm.
					
					"Preservation of Koguryo Mural Paintings ", a book on the preservation and restoration of cultural heritages, introduces methods of scientific examination and checkup of the state of tomb mural paintings and of their preservation and treatment.
					
					Among the newly published books there is "Earthquake and Anecdotes" giving common knowledge of earthquake.

articles.title: Effective Vegetable Seed-Covering Material
articles.content:
Effective Vegetable Seed-Covering Material
						
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Koryo Biomedicine Centre under the State Academy of Sciences of the DPRK has developed a vegetable seed-covering material, attracting a great attention of experts.
					The material is a natural organic product which is manufactured with extract of medicinal herb abundant in the country as the main and in combination with nutritive and active substances and additives.
					
					It, made on the basis of the Koryo pharmaceutical technology, contains various nutritive elements, active material and insecticidal and germicidal agents.
					
					The seed-covering material not only promotes the initial growth of crops and shortens their vegetative period so as to increase the yield but also makes their resistance strong against the unfavorable conditions (damages by cold-weather, drought, rain and storm and salt) and against damage by blight and harmful insects.
					
					It is applicable widely to rice, maize, bean, wheat, barley, potato, various kinds of vegetables, flowering plants and others. It has been already introduced into the various units throughout the country. Last year witnessed that the crops treated with it covered hundreds of thousands of hectares of land.
					
					Its advantages have been proved through the prevention of damage by blight and harmful insects and increased yield.
					
					Its application is very optimistic because it has no harmful influence on environment and human body and conforms to the current trend toward the organic farming method.

articles.title: Pine Trees Telling about Kim Jong Suk's Noble Intention
articles.content:
Pine Trees Telling about Kim Jong Suk's Noble Intention
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese heroine, visited Mangyongdae Revolutionary School in April Juche 37 (1948) to plant pine trees on the campus.
					 After exchanging greetings with officials she went up the hill together with young Kim Jong Il, fixed planting sites and began to dig holes.
					
					 An official asked her only to guide the planting of the day, not working herself. With a smile on her face, she said she was there to plant trees and how she could look on planting idly. She told him not to worry about her and hasten the work.
					
					 The officials tried to dissuade her time and again, but she put a sapling in the hole, saying how nice it was to plant trees around the school on their own.
					
					 She planted trees with all care, telling them the trees should be planted with the side with many branches facing the south.
					
					 After supporting each tree with sticks, she said she had decided to plant pine trees around the school because she thought it was desirable to plant trees symbolizing the growth and future of the students. She added that she wanted the bereaved children of revolutionary martyrs to grow as stalwart as the ever-green pine trees and pursue the will of their parents.
					
					 The pine trees are still standing on the campus of the school with their roots deeply struck.

articles.title: U.S. Chiefly to Blame for Disturbing Peace and Security
articles.content:
U.S. Chiefly to Blame for Disturbing Peace and Security
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Last year the United States' military spending accounted for 42 percent of the world-wide military spending and thus topped the world list of military spending, according to a recent annual report released by the Stockholm International Peace Research Institute of Sweden. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to prove that the U.S. is the country with the biggest military spending in the world and a "champion" in arms expansion.  It is chiefly to blame for seriously threatening and disturbing global peace and security. 
					
					 The present U.S. administration is loudmouthed about "changes" and "multilateral cooperative diplomacy" but is as keen on the arms build-up as the Bush administration which put spurs to it under the pretext of "war on terrorism". 
					
					 In case of the U.S. the increased military expenditure precisely means arms build-up and it is aimed to escalate the military actions for aggression.  It is the strategic aim and invariable ambition of the U.S. to dominate the world by dint of military force.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless moves for increasing military spending and arms build-up are aimed to establish an unchallenged military edge and realize the ambition for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. reckless moves for increasing military spending amount to acts against peace as they fan up the world-wide arms race and military confrontation and strain the international situation. 
					
					 The U.S. is working hard to escalate the offensive of military pressure against the DPRK, regarding it as a thorn in its flesh, as it is advancing under the uplifted banner of independence and socialism. 
					
					 They are getting evermore desperate in their moves to pose a nuclear threat to the DPRK and start a nuclear war against it, while clamoring about the provision of a "nuclear umbrella" to south Korea and Japan. 
					
					 The DPRK was entirely right when it took measures to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with these moves. 
					
					 Under the present serious situation where arms race is escalated and peace is seriously disturbed, the DPRK is left with no option but to further bolster up its war deterrent under the banner of Songun in order to protect the right of the country and the nation to exist and its sovereignty and security.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Draw Lesson from Its Defeat in Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Draw Lesson from Its Defeat in Korean War
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The armed provocations perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists in areas along the 38th parallel were premeditated military actions to ignite an all-out war in the light of their scale, persistency and repetition, etc. and a prelude to the Korean war. The U.S. imperialists were the arch criminals who masterminded these provocations and with no rhetoric can they cover up the criminal nature of those actions. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It cites facts to prove that the U.S. imperialists which had been greedy for the Korean Peninsula since long time ago occupied south Korea after the second World War, established a system of "military rule" and worked hard to provoke a war in a bid to dominate the whole of Korea.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. imperialists in perpetrating ceaseless armed provocations against the northern half of Korea in areas along the 38th parallel was to help the south Korean puppet army build actual combat capability so that it might be used as bullet-shields for them during the war of aggression against the north, weaken the defence by the Korean security forces stationed there and spy on the military forces of the north and their deployment. Through these acts they also sought the aim to aggravate the situation in an effort to create conditions favorable for launching a war and go over to an all-out war when their ceaseless armed provocations prove successful.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists started the Korean war while going busy with armed provocations against the DPRK at that time but drank a bitter cup of defeat. Instead of drawing a lesson from it, they are getting frantic with the moves to provoke the second Korean war, obsessed with their ambition for aggression of Korea, the article notes, and warns: 
					
					 If the U.S. imperialists misjudge the strength and will of the DPRK's army and people and ignite a new war at any cost, they will suffer a more disgraceful defeat than what they did during the Korean war in the 1950s.

articles.title: U.S. Urged Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK as Early as Possible
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Roll Back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK as Early as Possible
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The U.S. keeps frantically kicking up rackets of "sanctions" and "pressure" against the DPRK, terming its launch of a satellite for peaceful purposes and nuclear activities for self-defence as a "violation" and "threat to peace." This has pushed the situation in the Korean Peninsula to such a pass that a war may break out any moment. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 This is a clear revelation of the U.S. anachronistic and criminal hostile policy towards the DPRK as it is obstructing the reconciliation, unity and reunification of the Korean nation and seeks to ignite a war of aggression against it. 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK is the one of national split and anti-reunification confrontation as it is designed to keep Korea divided into two and stoke mistrust and confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. forces landed in south Korea under the pretext of "disarming" the defeated Japanese army, prompted by the criminal scenario to turn south Korea into its colony and strategic stronghold and, on this basis, to put under its control Northeast Asia including the whole of Korea.
					
					 It is the sinister intention of the U.S. to invade the DPRK, keeping south Korea under its domination for an indefinite period and using it as its advanced base. The U.S. remains unchanged in its policy towards the DPRK aimed at antagonizing it and seizing it by force of arms.
					
					 The U.S. ever-more undisguised scenario to invade the DPRK found a vivid manifestation in the facts that it is escalating its rackets of international "sanctions" and "pressure" upon the DPRK, malignantly slandering its launch of a satellite and nuclear activities for self-defence and made a promise to provide "a nuclear umbrella" to the south Korean authorities in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula, hinting at its start of a nuclear war.
					
					 It has become more apparent than ever before that lasting peace on the Korean Peninsula would be unthinkable without putting an end to the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and its moves to isolate and suffocate the latter.
					
					 The U.S. had better roll back as early as possible its hostile policy towards the DPRK, the leftover of the outdated era of confrontation, which runs counter to the trend of the times towards peace and reunification, concludes the article.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries Chided for Seeking to Purchase F-22
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries Chided for Seeking to Purchase F-22
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japanese Defense Minister Hamada expressed his intention to introduce F-22 from the U.S. The Japanese ambassador to the U.S. disclosed that the Japanese government is conferring with those concerned of U.S. Congress on the successful introduction of the fighter.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 F-22 is capable of carrying out operational duties in the vast Asian region including the Korean Peninsula in a short span of time. Through the early introduction of the new-type fighter the Japanese reactionaries seek to round off the capacity for mounting a surprise preemptive attack on other countries and secure a military guarantee for realizing their wild ambition for overseas expansion.
					
					 Overseas aggression is an invariable wild ambition and strategic goal of the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 To this end the Japanese reactionaries are rushing headlong into the moves to turn the country into a military power and launch overseas aggression, openly disclosing their militarist true nature, after completely throwing off the veil of "pacifist state". The Japan "Self-Defense Forces" have emerged leading aggression forces after growing in numerical strength and quality strong enough to fight any overseas war of aggression. Japan has emerged an aggression force and a war state equipped with perfect and modern offensive armed forces system. Not content with this, it is keen to have in place armed forces for aggression and attack by introducing new-type fighters and other military hardware from the U.S. in a craftier manner. This proves that its wild ambition for overseas expansion has reached an extreme phase.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop going reckless, well aware that their reckless moves to become a military power and launch overseas expansion would only throw Japan into an abyss of ruin.

articles.title: Unreasonable Suppression of Patriotic Youth Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unreasonable Suppression of Patriotic Youth Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang June 24 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on June 18 denouncing the puppet authorities for their unreasonable suppression of Kim Pok Gi, former executive chairman of the solidarity.
					 The statement recalled that the judicial authorities held a trial of Kim Pok Gi that day and upheld the judgment made at the first trial which sentenced him to a prison term and brought against him even the charge of violation of the "National Security Law," a law against human rights and reunification. 
					
					 The statement denounced the judicial authorities as servants of the Lee regime who do not know how to distinguish patriotism from treachery as they brought the above-said charge against him, instead of taking an action to withdraw the unreasonable indictment passed by the prosecution on him.
					
					 Even elementary democracy has disappeared in south Korea, it deplored, stressing the need to make a clean sweep of the undemocratic, anti-reunification conservative ruling forces in order to put an end to the reality in which even the "National Assembly" and the courts are under the thumb of the dictatorial forces.

articles.title: Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step down Declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle to Force Dictatorial Regime to Step down Declared in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The Democratic Labor Party of south Korea held a meeting in Pusan on June 21 and published a declaration which calls for turning out in the struggle to force the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime to step down.
					 The declaration said that the people's livelihood is deteriorated, the inter-Korean relations are driven into a crisis and such a tragedy in which even a former "president" committed a suicide occurred due to the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak has paid no heed to the voices of the people calling for a switchover in the "state administration" since he came to power, it said, asserting that neither the people's livelihood nor democracy nor improved inter-Korean relations can be expected as long as Lee is allowed to stay in power.
					
					 It stressed that the party would brand the Lee Myung Bak "government" as a dictatorial regime and turn out in the struggle to force it to step down.

articles.title: Anti-"Government" Struggle Waged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"Government" Struggle Waged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Members of the All-People Measure Committee against Murder of Ryongsan Evacuees in south Korea, bereaved families of the victims and citizens staged an anti-"government" struggle in protest against the puppet group of traitors' murder in Seoul on June 20.
					 A memorial meeting was held on the spot where the Ryongsan tragedy occurred.
					
					 The participants strongly condemned the authorities for having forcibly evacuated inhabitants in Ryongsan under the plea of the "redevelopment" and ruthlessly killed those who protested against the evacuation.
					
					 They demanded Lee Myung Bak make an apology for the killing and punish those responsible for it.
					
					 At the end of the meeting its participants staged a demonstration.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation Published in S. Korea
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation Published in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- At least 10,000 Christians of south Korea made public a declaration on the situation on June 18.
					 The declaration said that after Lee Myung Bak took office the achievements for democracy made by the people at the cost of blood were destroyed and the departed soul of dictatorship is swaggering about in south Korea and the peace of the Korean Peninsula is exposed to a grave threat.
					
					 It branded the Lee Myung Bak "government" as brazen-faced political forces which always tell a pact of lies, justify the violent rule under the pretext of "security" and trample underfoot even the elementary democratic rights, a cruel "government" which drove the police into killing and refuses to repent of this, and a "government" turning aside the demands of the people.
					
					 Expressing resentment at this deplorable reality, the declaration said that Christians would turn out in the struggle for democracy and human rights.
					
					 It stressed the need to oust the forces threatening peace with confrontation and war moves from power.

articles.title: UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions" Rejected
articles.content:
UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions" Rejected
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- The National Social Federation "for the Union and Union's Communist Party" of Belarus released a statement on June 17 in protest against the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK adopted by the United Nations Security Council at the instigation of the U.S. over the DPRK's second nuclear test.
					 The statement noted that the adoption of the "resolution on sanctions" by the UNSC evidently proved that it is no more than a tool of the U.S., the statement said, resolutely rejecting the "resolution" which is contrary to the interests of the world peace-loving people.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 The DPRK has the right to protect itself and there is no authority for any country or even the UN to interfere in its internal affairs. Since the nuclear-weapons states refuse to dismantle their nukes while brandishing their nuclear sticks, it is natural for sovereign states to have access to the nuclear deterrent so as to cope with such behavior.
					
					 The statement expressed full support for the DPRK Foreign Ministry statement which declared that the DPRK would weaponize the whole amount of newly extracted plutonium and start the uranium enrichment and counter with resolute military action any attempted blockade by the U.S. and its followers, regarding it as an action of war.
					
					 It called upon the world peace-loving people to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in the struggle to defend their socialist system.
					
					 On the same day, Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, issued a statement censuring the "resolution".

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Nine political parties and organizations including the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, the National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche idea of Mexico and the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification issued a joint statement on June 15 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The statement vehemently rejected the "resolution on sanctions" against DPRK adopted by the UN Security Council at the instigation of the United States over the DPRK's second nuclear test and expressed full support for the tough countermeasures taken by the DPRK to defend the sovereignty of the country and dignity of the nation with the might of Songun at the present stage in which all-out confrontation with the U.S. started.
					
					 It strongly condemned the reckless anti-reunification and anti-DPRK moves of the Lee Myung Bak group totally denying the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and following the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					Korea's reunification, the behests of President Kim Il Sung, should be realized independently by the concerted efforts of the entire Korean nation under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the great programmes for independent reunification provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the statement stressed.
					
					 It demanded that the U.S. put an end to its anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK, stop the joint military exercises for aggression on the DPRK and unconditionally and immediately withdraw its imperialist aggression troops and all war equipment from south Korea.
					
					 It called upon all political parties, governments and organizations of the world to denounce the U.S. imperialists and their followers for the moves to stifle the DPRK and render full support to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Korean People's Efforts for Building Thriving Nation Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Efforts for Building Thriving Nation Supported
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, released a statement on June 17 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., WPK was an event of historic significance in developing the WPK and accomplishing the Korean people's cause of socialism.
					
					 It expressed the conviction that the Korean people would smash every challenge and offensive of the imperialist forces with the might of single-minded unity more powerful than nuclear weapons and open the gate to a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation in a few years to come.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Korean people will surly emerge victorious in the efforts to build a thriving nation, rallied closer around the WPK headed by Kim Jong Il, the statement extended solidarity to the WPK and the heroic Korean people.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Declaration Hailed
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Declaration Hailed
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- Organizations of different countries and a personage of an international body issued statements to mark the 9th anniversary of the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee in its statement on June 14 said that the adoption of the joint declaration brought about the historic era of "By our nation itself," an era of detente and cooperation between the north and the south of Korea.
					
					The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain in its statement on June 11 said: We are convinced that Korea's reunification will be realized without fail under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il though temporary difficulties may lie in the struggle of the Korean people advancing under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself".
					
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, in his statement on June 10 noted that the reunification movement of Korea has been put at the worst crisis, in which the north-south relations were totally bedeviled and are headed for the extreme confrontation, since the Lee Myung Bak "government" in south Korea denied the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and refused to implement them. The world peace-loving people hope that the Korean people would surely achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of the June 15 joint declaration, the statement said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded
Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- A seminar of progressive political parties was held at the building of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), a meeting, a book and photo exhibition and a film show in France and a lecture in Mongolia between June 11 and 13 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the 9th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration and the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were works of Kim Jong Il, photos showing his immortal feats and books and photos introducing the achievements gained by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Figures of British political circles noted with high appreciation that Kim Jong Il has strengthened the WPK into the party of President Kim Il Sung and led the showdown with the United States and the building of a thriving nation to a shining victory and that he provided the inter-Korean summit meeting, the first of its kind in the history of Korean nation's division, and the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, said that the inter-Korean relations are now at the worst crisis and the serious situation under which a war may break out any moment is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the anti-reunification moves of the Lee Myung Bak group totally denying the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. He demanded that the south Korean puppet authorities implement to the letter the historic inter-Korean declarations, dropping the policy of following the U.S.
					
					 N. Sarantuya, member of the Leadership Council of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, praised the Songun politics as the most powerful and just mode of politics that helps defend Korean-style socialism and reliably guarantee peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and further increase the national defence capability.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held in Britain.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Austria 
 Pyongyang, June 24 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" was brought out in booklet by Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna, Austria on June 17. 
					 The work published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008) says that the 60-year long history of the DPRK is a history of great struggle and victory and that of great creation and changes during which its independence and honor have been protected and a prosperous socialist state has emerged, weathering the tempest of revolution under the leadership of the great leader and the great party and clarifies the idea that even a small and backward country can become a developed country and a dignified power when it has a great leader and a great party. 
					
					 The work indicates tasks and ways for finally accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding high the banner of Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del conjunto de danza Moiseyev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion del conjunto de danza Moiseyev
  Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion del Conjunto de Danza Folclorica Academica Nacional Moiseyev de Rusia, que realiza una gira por las localidades de Corea.
					  Le acogio en el teatro la gerente Elena Sherbakova quien preside el citado conjunto.
					
					  Ella le dedico al Dirigente el presente preparado por su entidad artistica.
					
					  Tras expresar el agradecimiento, el Dirigente aprecio mucho las apasionadas funciones que ofrecieron los artistas rusos en el centro y las localidades durante su estancia en Corea y sostuvo cordiales conversaciones con ella.
					
					  Cuando el Dirigente aparecio en el palco, todos los espectadores le dieron una calida bienvenida con estruendosa ovacion.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, el primer vicecanciller Kang Sok Ju, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong y Hyon Chol Hae, los funcionarios de las ramas de cultura, arte, prensa e informacion, los creadores y los artistas.
					
					  Los artistas rusos, que se familiarizaron con el pueblo coreano en sus reiteradas visitas a Corea, pusieron en la escena las danzas de Rusia "Verano", "Baile de Kalmyk" y "Muchacha de Tatar", "Yablochko" de la suite coreografica de flota, la folclorica coreana "Baile en trio", el "Baile de Bulgaria", la "Danza de escultura de Mongolia", el baile de Ucrania "Nevasca", el de Espana "Jota aragonesa", el "Tango argentino" del ballet de un solo acto "Noche en la posada" y otras piezas.
					
					  A traves de la funcion, los artistas reflejaron vividamente con sus grandes talentos artisticos la vida optimista, la idiosincrasia y las tipicas costumbres de vida del pueblo ruso y otras naciones patentizando la larga historia y tradiciones de su conjunto.
					
					  La funcion, que reflejo emocionantemente los sentimientos de los pueblos de varios paises, arranco efusiva ovacion del publico.
					
					  El Dirigente felicito los exitos de la funcion de los artistas y les envio su saludo.

articles.title: Obreros y gremiales de FGSC repudian a los imperialistas yanquis
articles.content:
Obreros y gremiales de FGSC repudian a los imperialistas yanquis
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del "Dia de Lucha Antiyanqui-25 de Junio", tuvo lugar el dia 23 a la orilla del rio Taedong, donde estan situados el Monumento al Hundimiento del Barco Invasor "Sherman" de Estados Unidos y el barco espia armado "Pueblo" de este pais, el mitin de repudio de los obreros y los gremiales de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea.
					  En la ocasion los oradores recordaron que el imperialismo yanqui, enemigo jurado que comenzo a echar las garras de agresion sobre Corea ya desde hace mas de 100 anos, provoco por fin el 25 de junio de 1950 la guerra para aniquilar a la recien fundada Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					  Desenmascararon que la guerra coreana fue la mas descarada y bandidesca que no tiene precedentes en la historia mundial de las guerras, y el escenario de las matanzas inimaginablemente barbaras.
					
					  Si nos impone de nuevo la guerra ese imperio que hizo sufrir historicamente a nuestro pueblo todas las desgracias y sufrimientos, nuestro ejercito y pueblo barreran una vez por todas a los agresivos de la faz de la Tierra empleando toda la capacidad de autodefensa nacional, que venimos fortaleciendo por todos los medios bajo la direccion del Songun (priorizacion militar) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, General Insigne del monte Paektu, y cumpliran sin falta la historica causa de la reunificacion de la patria, afirmaron.
					
					  La clase obrera y los miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea deben defender en lo politico e ideologico a costa de la vida al Dirigente, destino de la patria y la nacion, y dar continuidad a la historia de la invicta Corea del Songun con el poderio de la unidad monolitica, mas potente que el arma nuclear, en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion.
					
					  En el conclave se dio lectura a la declaracion de repudio.

articles.title: Trabajadores agricolas juran la venganza
articles.content:
Trabajadores agricolas juran la venganza
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ATCC) -- Con motivo del "Dia de la lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio" tuvo lugar el dia 23 en la explanada del pabellon de la educacion clasista de la ciudad de Kaesong el acto de los trabajadores agricolas para tomar la determinacion de vengarse de los enemigos.
					  En la ocasion hubo informe de Kang Chang Uk, presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea e intervenciones. 
					
					  Los oradores calificaron la guerra coreana provocada por los imperialistas yanquis de la guerra mas descarada, bandidesca y agresiva para aplastar a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y convertirla en su colonia.
					
					  Los imperialistas norteamericanos introdujeron en la guerra coreana mas de 2 millones de efectivos incluyendo sus fuerzas armadas agresoras y enormes equipos belicos, asesinaron a diestra y siniestra a los inocentes habitantes y convirtieron las ciudades, campos, fabricas, empresas, escuelas y hospitales en monton de cenizas, senalaron y condenaron las atrocidades salvajes de los enemigos. 
					
					Agregaron que tienen que mantener el pleno estado de alerta combativa y enfatizaron que si los imperialistas norteamericanos invaden una pulgada de tierra fertil de Corea, defenderan hasta el fin el territorio patrio con la decision de vida o muerte.
					
					Destacaron que mientras hay la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, insigne General del monte Paektu, las fuerzas militares invencibles y el poderio de la unidad monolitica entre el ejercito y el pueblo, no temen ninguna sancion ni bloqueo de los  yanquis. La victoria es la nuestra, concluyeron los oradores.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de amenazador a paz y seguridad
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de amenazador a paz y seguridad
Pyongyang, 24 de junio (ATCC) -- Segun el recien publicado informe anual del Instituto Internacional de la Paz de Estocolmo de Suecia, Estados Unidos ocupo el primer lugar en el ano pasado en la cantidad de los gastos militares que alcanzo el 42 % de la totalidad de los fondos desembolsados por ese concepto en todo el mundo.
					  Esto demuestra que ese imperio es el mayor inversor en el area militar y "campeon" del incremento de gastos militares.
					
					  Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 24 y continua:
					
					  EE.UU. es el autor que amenaza y destruye gravemente la paz y la seguridad del mundo.
					
					  Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que la actual administracion norteamericana, que habla tanto del "cambio" y la "diplomacia de cooperacion multilateral",  recurre al aumento de gastos militares al igual que su antecesor ejecutivo de Bush que dio acicate al incremento de las fuerzas armadas bajo el pretexto de la "guerra antiterrorista".
					
					  La crecida de gastos militares de EE.UU. significa precisamente el aumento armamentista para intensificar las acciones militares agresivas.
					
					  Tomar la heguemonia mundial con la fuerza armada, o sea, a base de la absoluta superioridad militar deviene el objetivo estrategico y la invariable ambicion de EE.UU.
					
					  Tales movimientos del imperio devienen el acto antipaz que fomenta la carrera armamentista y la confrontacion militar en la arena mundial y agrava la situacion internacional.
					
					  EE.UU. recrudece la ofensiva de presion militar contra la RPDC, que marcha levantando a lo mas alto la bandera de independencia y la socialista, considerandola como la espina atravesada en su garganta.
					
					  En particular, amenaza a la RPDC con desatar la guerra nuclear prometiendo al Sur de Corea y Japon la entrega del "paraguas nuclear".
					
					  Por lo tanto, es muy justo que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea haya fortalecido su disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo para hacer frente a tal amenaza.
					
					  Bajo la critica situacion de hoy en que se exacerba la carrera armamentista y se destruye gravemente la paz, la RPDC consolidara mas y mas su disuasivo de guerra bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar) para defender el derecho a la existencia, la soberania y la seguridad del pais y la nacion.
